main.name: Parth Patel
main.occupation: ReactJS Developer && Mentor && New Media Designer
main.bio: Hello! My name is Parth and I live in alluring San Francisco, CA. I am deeply in love with the views of the city from marina greens. Other than that, I love coffee roasters in the city and have tried almost every coffee roaster in the city. I first felt my love for front-end designing and development when I was designing my final project for my under grad. After, that I am going deep and deep everyday with designing for digital world. In the previous years I have had the opportunity to work on various kind of designing jobs like Graphics Designing, UX, UI, Branding, Typography, and of course web and app designing. I recently worked with Saint Frank coffee for my typography and rebranding project. I also, worked on a UX designing project for an TravelApp. I am looking for an Internship opportunity in San Francisco, CA.
main.contactmessage: I am looking for Job opportunity based on ReactJS in San Francisco, CA. If you are looking for a detail oriented and perfection oriented in all aspects of UX designer or front-end designer and developer. Letâ€™s Connect!

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure to be Parth's group project member in the UX Design Immersive course. He is a really passionate team member with a strong curiosity and front-end skills. Moreover, he has a keen eye on technology development, so always give a piece of good advice and comment about the project we were working together :)
